text: Vladislav "Vlado" Mirković (Cyrillic: Bлaдиcлaв "Bлaдo" Mиpкoвић, born 26 March 1975, in Budva) is a Montenegrin retired football player. ==Club career== During his career, he played as forward and represented the following clubs: FK Mogren, FK Jedinstvo Paraćin, FK Rudar Pljevlja, Australian Carlton S.C., Red Star Belgrade and FK Bežanija. ==Honours== *Red Star **First League of FR Yugoslavia: 1999-00 and 2000-01 **Yugoslav Cup: 1999 and 2000 ==External sources== * Profile and stats at Srbijafudbal. * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:People from Budva Category:Serbia and Montenegro footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:FK Mogren players Category:FK Rudar Pljevlja players Category:Carlton S.C. players Category:Red Star Belgrade footballers Category:FK Bežanija players Category:OFK Beograd players Category:First League of Serbia and Montenegro players Category:National Soccer League (Australia) players Category:Serbia and Montenegro expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate soccer players in Australia Category:Serbia and Montenegro expatriate sportspeople in Australia
title: Vlado Mirković
